title: How to Change a Tail Light Bulb on Nissan Versa Hatchback

steps.title: Look directly behind the Taillight assembly for 2 plastic interior snap covers.
steps.content: Look directly behind the Taillight assembly for 2 plastic interior snap covers. The covers have a small slit opening in them.

steps.title: Gently pop each cover off.
steps.content: Gently pop each cover off. Behind each cover, you will see a small 10MM or 8MM nut attached to the taillight assembly stud. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Use a 10MM or 8MM socket, small extension drive, and a ratchet.
steps.content: Use a 10MM or 8MM socket, small extension drive, and a ratchet. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Use the open end wrench or a flex socket adapter.
steps.content: Use the open end wrench or a flex socket adapter. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Start at the bottom of the Taillight.
steps.content: Start at the bottom of the Taillight. Slowly pry very slightly under the Taillight until it starts to move away from the body. Start at the bottom then the middle of the Taillight. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Grab the Taillight and gently pull it away from the vehicle.
steps.content: Grab the Taillight and gently pull it away from the vehicle. If it doesn't move, gently pry very slightly a few more times until it does.

steps.title: Locate the Taillight bulb socket.
steps.content: Locate the Taillight bulb socket. Turn it counter clockwise until it releases from the Taillight. With the socket in your hand, carefully grab the bulb and pull it out of the socket and insert a new one. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Gently insert the socket into the Taillight assembly.
steps.content: Gently insert the socket into the Taillight assembly. Turn the socket clock wise until it clicks into the Taillight assembly and does not spin anymore.

steps.title: Align the studs of the Taillight with the holes in the body of the vehicle.
steps.content: Align the studs of the Taillight with the holes in the body of the vehicle. Then, push the Taillight assembly back into the car, making sure it sits flush with the body of the vehicle.

steps.title: Replace both 10-8mm nuts on the Taillight studs.
steps.content: Replace both 10-8mm nuts on the Taillight studs. Then, snap them back into place both interior covers. [6] X Research source

steps.title: You've successfully changed a Taillight bulb in a Nissan Versa Hatchback.
steps.content: You've successfully changed a Taillight bulb in a Nissan Versa Hatchback.
